title: Performance Evaluation Competency Enhancement Program via Virtual World-Based HRD Role-Playing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Human Resource Development (HRD) Concepts and Organizational Communication Experience
context.additional_context: Role-playing in virtual worlds using personal devices, featuring multicultural scenarios and peer feedback structures in a practice-oriented design.

learning_goals: Implement feedback delivery skills with over 80% accuracy through performance evaluation role-playing in virtual environments
Apply conflict management strategies at least three times in simulations reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds
Observe peer role-playing and provide at least two improvement points through formative assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
